issues.title: Healthcare Reform
issues.description: Supports Medicare for All, believes healthcare is a human right, advocates for reducing prescription drug prices

issues.title: Marijuana Legalization
issues.description: Strong supporter of federal marijuana legalization, advocates for expunging prior marijuana convictions

issues.title: Minimum Wage Increase
issues.description: Supports raising federal minimum wage to $15 per hour, believes in living wage for workers

issues.title: Climate Change Action
issues.description: Supports Green New Deal, advocates for aggressive carbon reduction and renewable energy investments

issues.title: Criminal Justice Reform
issues.description: Supports comprehensive criminal justice reform, advocates for ending mass incarceration and systemic racism

issues.title: Immigration Reform
issues.description: Supports comprehensive immigration reform, path to citizenship for undocumented immigrants, protects DACA

issues.title: Education Funding
issues.description: Advocates for increased federal education funding, supports student debt relief, free community college

issues.title: Workers' Rights
issues.description: Strong support for union rights, collective bargaining, and protecting workers' economic interests
